verses.verse: Then the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>
"And you, son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> will you judge,<WH8199> will you judge<WH8199> the bloody<WH1818> city<WH5892>? Then cause her to know<WH3045> all<WH3605> her abominations.<WH8441>

"And you shall say,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068>" A city<WH5892> shedding<WH8210> blood<WH1818> in her midst,<WH8432> so that her time<WH6256> will come,<WH935> and that makes<WH6213> idols,<WH1544> contrary<WH5921> to her [interest,] for defilement!<WH2930>

"You have become<WH816> guilty<WH816> by the blood<WH1818> which<WH834> you have shed,<WH8210> and defiled<WH2930> by your idols<WH1544> which<WH834> you have made.<WH6213> Thus you have brought<WH7126> your day<WH3117> near<WH7126> and have come<WH935> to your years;<WH8141> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I have made<WH5414> you a reproach<WH2781> to the nations,<WH1471> and a mocking<WH7048> to all<WH3605> the lands.<WH776>
"Those who<WH7138> are near<WH7138> and those who<WH7350> are far<WH7350> from you will mock<WH7046> you, you of ill<WH2931> repute,<WH8034> full<WH7227> of turmoil.<WH4103>
"Behold,<WH2009> the rulers<WH5387> of Israel,<WH3478> each<WH376> according to his power,<WH2220> have been<WH1961> in you for the purpose<WH4616> of shedding<WH8210> blood.<WH1818>

"They have treated<WH7043> father and mother<WH1> lightly<WH517> within you. The alien<WH7043> they have oppressed<WH1616> <WH6213> in your midst;<WH6233> the fatherless<WH8432> and the widow<WH3490> they have wronged<WH490> in you.
"You have despised<WH959> My holy<WH6944> things<WH6944> and profaned<WH2490> My sabbaths.<WH7676>

"Slanderous<WH7400> men<WH376> have been<WH1961> in you for the purpose<WH4616> of shedding<WH8210> blood,<WH1818> and in you they have eaten<WH398> at the mountain<WH2022> [shrines.] In your midst<WH8432> they have committed<WH6213> acts<WH2154> of lewdness.<WH2154>
"In you they have uncovered<WH1540> [their] fathers' nakedness;<WH6172> in you they have humbled<WH6031> her who<WH2931> was unclean<WH2931> in her menstrual<WH5079> impurity.<WH5079>

"And one<WH376> has committed<WH6213> abomination<WH8441> with his neighbor's wife,<WH802> and another<WH376> has lewdly<WH2154> defiled<WH2930> his daughter-in-law<WH1323>. And another<WH376> in you has humbled<WH6031> his sister,<WH269> his father's daughter.

"In you they have taken<WH3947> bribes<WH7810> to shed<WH8210> blood;<WH1818> you have taken<WH3947> interest<WH5392> and profits,<WH8636> and you have injured<WH1214> your neighbors<WH7453> for gain<WH1214> by oppression,<WH6233> and you have forgotten<WH7911> Me," declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>
"Behold,<WH2009> then, I smite<WH5221> My hand<WH3709> at your dishonest<WH1215> gain<WH1215> which<WH834> you have acquired<WH6213> and at the bloodshed<WH1818> which<WH834> is among<WH8432> you.

"Can your heart<WH3820> endure,<WH5975> or<WH518> can your hands<WH3027> be strong,<WH2388> in the days<WH3117> that I shall deal<WH6213> with you? I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> and shall act.<WH6213>
"And I shall scatter<WH6327> you among the nations,<WH1471> and I shall disperse<WH2219> you through the lands,<WH776> and I shall consume<WH8552> your uncleanness<WH2932> from you.
"And you will profane<WH2490> yourself in the sight<WH5869> of the nations,<WH1471> and you will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>"' "
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> has become<WH1961> dross<WH5509> to Me; all<WH3605> of them are bronze<WH5178> and tin<WH913> and iron<WH1270> and lead<WH5777> in the furnace;<WH3564> they are the dross<WH5509> of silver.<WH3701>

"Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Because<WH3282> all<WH3605> of you have become<WH1961> dross,<WH5509> therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I am going to gather<WH6908> you into the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

'As they gather<WH6910> silver<WH3701> and bronze<WH5178> and iron<WH1270> and lead<WH5777> and tin<WH913> into the furnace<WH3564> to blow<WH5301> fire<WH784> on it in order to melt<WH5413> [it,] so<WH3651> I shall gather<WH6908> [you] in My anger<WH639> and in My wrath,<WH2534> and I shall lay<WH5117> you [there] and melt<WH5413> you.
'And I shall gather<WH3664> you and blow<WH5301> on you with the fire<WH784> of My wrath,<WH5678> and you will be melted<WH5413> in the midst<WH8432> of it.

'As silver<WH3701> is melted<WH2046> in the furnace,<WH3564> so<WH3651> you will be melted<WH5413> in the midst<WH8432> of it; and you will know<WH3045> that I, the Lord,<WH3068> have poured<WH8210> out My wrath<WH2534> on you.' "
And the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>
"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> say<WH559> to her, 'You are a land<WH776> that is not cleansed<WH2891> or rained<WH1652> on in the day<WH3117> of indignation.<WH2195>'

"There is a conspiracy<WH7195> of her prophets<WH5030> in her midst,<WH8432> like a roaring<WH7580> lion<WH738> tearing<WH2963> the prey.<WH2964> They have devoured<WH398> lives;<WH5315> they have taken<WH3947> treasure<WH2633> and precious<WH3366> things;<WH3366> they have made<WH7235> many<WH7235> widows<WH490> in the midst<WH8432> of her.

"Her priests<WH3548> have done<WH2554> violence<WH2554> to My law<WH8451> and have profaned<WH2490> My holy<WH6944> things;<WH6944> they have made<WH914> no<WH3808> distinction<WH914> between<WH996> the holy<WH6944> and the profane,<WH2455> and they have not taught<WH3045> the difference between<WH996> the unclean<WH2931> and the clean;<WH2889> and they hide<WH5956> their eyes<WH5869> from My sabbaths,<WH7676> and I am profaned<WH2490> among<WH8432> them.

"Her princes<WH8269> within<WH7130> her are like wolves<WH2061> tearing<WH2963> the prey,<WH2964> by shedding<WH8210> blood<WH1818> [and] destroying lives<WH6> in order<WH5315> to get<WH4616> dishonest<WH1214> gain.<WH1214>

"And her prophets<WH5030> have smeared<WH2902> whitewash<WH9648> for them, seeing<WH2372> false<WH7723> visions<WH7723> and divining<WH7080> lies<WH3577> for them, saying,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068>' when the Lord<WH3068> has not spoken.<WH1696>

"The people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> have practiced<WH6231> oppression<WH6233> and committed<WH1497> robbery,<WH1498> and they have wronged<WH3238> the poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34> and have oppressed<WH6231> the sojourner<WH1616> without<WH3808> justice.<WH4941>

"And I searched<WH1245> for a man<WH376> among<WH4480> them who should build<WH1443> up the wall<WH1447> and stand<WH5975> in the gap<WH6556> before<WH6440> Me for the land,<WH776> that I should not destroy<WH7843> it; but I found<WH4672> no<WH3808> one.

"Thus I have poured<WH8210> out My indignation<WH2195> on them; I have consumed<WH3615> them with the fire<WH784> of My wrath;<WH5678> their way<WH1870> I have brought<WH5414> upon their heads,<WH7218>" declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>
